channel.title: [TUT] Direct linking for client cache (Firefox)
channel.description:
Here is a small tutorial how to get direct linking for your webclient/cleint cahce!
First what you have to do is upload your cache to any website where is available to upload files, for example mediafire. When you have finished with uploading simply start to download your file and then should open this window: [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/th.eb63f67d53.png[/img]
Now just pause download. Then: right click on it --> Copy Download site. Now you have copied the direct link of your uploaded file. Congratulations! :D
PS: Sorry if it was hard to read just my English sucks. :P
